sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait extrêmement chaud aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's extremely hot today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons respecter la discipline.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must observe discipline.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette affaire est extrêmement importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This matter is extremely important.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Rassemblement demain matin à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Gather at eight o'clock tomorrow morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的考试成绩刚好及格。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de kǎoshì chéngjì gānghǎo jígé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats d'examen sont tout juste passables.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His exam score just barely passed.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons lutter pour nos rêves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must fight for our dreams.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est sorti en courant précipitamment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He hurriedly ran out.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a quatre saisons dans une année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are four seasons in a year.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 士兵们在战斗中非常勇敢。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìbīngmen zài zhàndòu zhōng fēicháng yǒnggǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les soldats ont été très courageux au combat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The soldiers were very brave in battle.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 第一季度的销售额增长了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dì yī jìdù de xiāoshòu'é zēngzhǎng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les ventes du premier trimestre ont augmenté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: First quarter sales have increased.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ta saison préférée ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your favorite season?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jìrán nǐ lái le, jiù zuòxià ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Puisque tu es là, assieds-toi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Since you're here, please sit down.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de techniques pour apprendre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many techniques for learning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng jì yī fēng xìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais envoyer une lettre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to mail a letter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a deux frères.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has two brothers.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois faire des heures supplémentaires aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have to work overtime today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est qu'un arrangement temporaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is just a temporary arrangement.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle essaie de perdre du poids.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is trying to lose weight.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 假如明天下雨，我们就不去了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiǎrú míngtiān xià yǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il pleut demain, nous n'irons pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: If it rains tomorrow, we won't go.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je fais le ménage tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I do housework every day.
